docs.lead_paragraph: A study looked at bus drivers because their jobs require frequent — and generally courteous — interactions with many people.

headline.seo: Can a Fake Smile Be Bad for Your Health?
headline.main: The Claim: A Fake Smile Can be Bad for Your Health
headline.print_headline: The Claim: A Fake Smile Can Be Bad For Your Health

docs.snippet: A study looked at bus drivers because their jobs require frequent — and generally courteous — interactions with many people.

docs.lead_paragraph: In 9 of 10 cases in a study that reviewed 181,654 injuries, the child was alone, and most of the injuries were to the head and neck.

docs.snippet: In 9 of 10 cases in a study that reviewed 181,654 injuries, the child was alone, and most of the injuries were to the head and neck.
